oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Macedonia Baptist Church: view of church front, marquee sign, and bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of marquee sign and bell in front of church. The marquee sign, located inside a brick enclosure, reads "Macedonia SS 945; Church 1050; Pastor James Billings." A bell is mounted to the top of the brick enclosure. Another sign is located on the front of the church's portico. This sign's lettering reads, "Macedonia Baptist Church; Pastor James C. Billings."

Established in 1898, Macedonia Baptist Church resides in Newport, Tennessee. In 1978, the current building on White Oak Avenue was built under the pastorate of Reverend C. J. Mize. At the time of fieldwork, James C. Billings served as pastor.
